title: bardock1
body:
Bardock: This city, your city
So undeveloped..
I can help you with that
First, find your merchant
Lots of men that are traveling are getting injured
From those you save, one will want to be a merchant
Find that one[[stop]]

title: bardock2
body:
Bardock: Next you will want some soldiers
 watching over those halls for zombies
Find 4 soldiers[[stop]]

title: bardock3
body:
Bardock: Help some more civilians
Every one you help will come to the city
Increase the population of the city to 50[[stop]]

title: bardock4
body:
Bardock: You need medics
They can make medkits for you and your men
Each medic will develop a medkit in 20 minutes time
Recruting more medics will decrease the time for medications development[[stop]]
